content:
# EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Copper plate mine at position(x=41.0 y=-82.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Burner mining drill (position x=41.0 y=-82.0) and a furnace at position(x=41.0 y=-80.0)
-  Burner inserter (position x=39.5 y=-79.5) 
-  Burner inserter (position x=41.5 y=-78.5)

### Copper plate mine at position(x=60.0 y=-60.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Stone furnace (position x=60.0 y=-60.0)

### Electricity generator at position(x=106.5 y=-32.5)
Consists of following entities
-  Offshore pump (position x=106.5 y=-32.5)
-  Boiler (position x=111.5 y=-32.0)
-  Steam engine (position x=117.5 y=-30.5)
-  Pipe group (position x=107.5 y=-34.5)
-  Pipe group (position x=105.5 y=-32.5)

### Electricity network at position(x=114.5 y=-28.666666666666668)
Consists of following entities
-  Electricity group (position x=114.5 y=-28.666666666666668)

### Transport belt system at position(x=63.5 y=-53.5)
Consists of following entities
-  Transport belt (position x=63.5 y=-53.5)
-  Transport belt (position x=64.5 y=-53.5)

# ERROR TIPS
### Errors when using burner-mining-drill but being out of fuel
-  Ensure you have enough fuel to power the burner-mining-drill before using it
### Errors when using stone-furnace but having no ingredients
-  Ensure you have the necessary ingredients to use the stone-furnace before using it
### Errors when using boiler but being out of fuel
-  Ensure you have enough fuel to power the boiler before using it
### Errors when using steam-engine but not being connected
-  Ensure the steam-engine is connected to a power network before using it
### Errors when using electricity-group but not being plugged into electric network
-  Ensure the electricity-group is plugged into an electric network before using it

# NAMESPACE
*No utility functions have been defined or invoked*
*Important variables:*
- `x` and `y` coordinates of various entities (type: float)
- `EntityStatus` of various entities (type: enum)
